reviewText: Come Dance at my Wedding is a heartwarming story of acceptance of what you can not change and moving on.  For the Love of Grace is about not forgetting the past but moving on and accepting the future.  Briday Fever is a litte crazy but still cute and Good Witch is different.  It is a great price for four movies.
Title: Bridal Fever / The Good Witch / For the Love of Grace / Come Dance at My Wedding Romance 4 Film Collection

reviewText: These four movies especially Bridal Fever were so entertaining and light.  These four movies are not so serious but do address things like prejudice, death and grieving, forgiveness especially long held feelings of bitterness and remorse.  The resolutions of problems from the past or present in these stories was practical and realistic.The price was perfect for me and they provided hours of relaxation and entertainment on lazy evenings at home.
Title: Bridal Fever / The Good Witch / For the Love of Grace / Come Dance at My Wedding Romance 4 Film Collection

reviewText: This is a collection of four very nice stories.  My favorite is "For the love of Grace ".  I watch it over and over again because it is a story of compassion, of love, and true feelings of people who hae disasters turn into happy endings.  The other three stories are also very nicely done, easy to watch and enjoy.  Hallmark Hall of Fame movies are always uplifting with no violence, obscene language, or explicit sex.  Good family viewing.
Title: Bridal Fever / The Good Witch / For the Love of Grace / Come Dance at My Wedding Romance 4 Film Collection

reviewText: This is a good deal.  The movies are enjoyable and you get 4 fo rthe prices of one.  These are Hallmark so there is always a good family safe viewing.  Great for young girls and young at heart girls.

reviewText: Great date night viewing, all movies spiced with romance. The story lines have just the right recipe to satisfy your happy ending movie cravings. Pop the popcorn and gather 'round. Choose one from the main menu, or make time to sample them all. Each movie is tastefully done. Enjoy them.
summary: Four for Chick Flicks or Couples

reviewText: I almost Always love Hallmark Movies .It saddens Me That there are a few made Now that have Language in Them that takes away from the "Family" or the Theme is going More & More Into a "SINGLE PARENT " House Holds … I guess there are so many divorces now It is something that has to be recognized.Especially,the Christmas Shows!  As I said I Love Hallmarks Christmas the Best & Always have! I enjoy so much this policy !They Made 13 New  Movies  This past Christmas coming out with Several Stories on ONE DVD!They usually won't put the 2013 on DVD until It is about 2 years later !  I Already have purchased 2 of These DVD's  of these DVD Movies have 2 of these Stories on DVD already ,  I can give them to Someone who doesn't have a copy ! It takes Up Less Space which is an advantage to Me. The Movies are Full Length(nothing Cut Out!) I enjoy watching a DVD Now more than the TV version JUST because of All the Advertisements( Especially the last 1/2 Hour Before the Movie is completed! My Dad said When We First had to go with cable ,That was their Reason for purchasing  "Cable" was to of the channels already !Of Course We have Many many more Channels to watch ! That isn't why I am enjoying these ideas  ! I hope They Continue this Way doing More of these !  Even if They are more costly,To Me it's worthi t!
Title: Bridal Fever / The Good Witch / For the Love of Grace / Come Dance at My Wedding Romance 4 Film Collection

reviewText: This movie pack is a must for those who love a good romantic comedy. My favorite is Bridal Fever with the  always wonderful Andrea Roth. She finds the right man, who is not looking for Ms Right but of course changes his mind at the end of the movie. There is the gorgeous Mark Conselos as a firefighter and Catherine Bell as the good witch. For a great day or weekend of romance, this set is a must.
Title: Bridal Fever / The Good Witch / For the Love of Grace / Come Dance at My Wedding Romance 4 Film Collection

reviewText: I've seen all the movies before on television except Bridal Fever. I am most disappointed in the DVD because since  they were Hallmark movies they should be close captioned.  The notice on Hallmark states their movies have been close captioned since 1990.Hallmark also posted that close captioning is part of the filming process.  So why is close captioning removed when I buy a DVD from Amazon.  I really could not rate this movie because I cannot hear it and there is no close captioning so I can't read what is being said.
Title: Bridal Fever / The Good Witch / For the Love of Grace / Come Dance at My Wedding Romance 4 Film Collection

reviewText: This is not really a review. I just wished to add this information about the four movies included in this collection. I hope it is useful.Bridal Fever (2008) - TV Movie - 88 min - Romance - Director: Ron Oliver - Stars: Andrea Roth, Delta Burke and Gabriel Hogan.The Good Witch (2008) - TV Movie - 89 min - Family / Fantasy - Director: Craig Pryce - Stars: Catherine Bell, Chris Potter and Catherine Disher.For the Love of Grace (2008) - TV Movie - 88 min - Drama / Romance - Director: Craig Pryce - Stars: Mark Consuelos, Chandra West and Corbin Bernsen.Come Dance at My Wedding (2009) - TV Movie - 85 min - Drama - Director: Mark Jean - Stars: John Schneider, Brooke Nevin and Roma Downey.
summary: This is not really a review
Title: Bridal Fever / The Good Witch / For the Love of Grace / Come Dance at My Wedding Romance 4 Film Collection
